task.title: How to Multiply Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instruction about using the multiplication feature of JPS Calculator app

context.p: To successfully multiply numbers, you must know what is Multiplication

result.p: The result from the multiplication is displayed.

taskbody.example: You want to multiply 2 and 3. The equation will look like: 2x3=6. You enter 2. Press multiply. Enter 3. Press equals. The result 6 appears on the screen.
